languages.text: {n}Полным торжественности голосом преподобный начинает:{/n} "Каждому человеку отведено место в созданном Им порядке, потому надобно следовать этому порядку и всяко подчиняться воле вышестоящих. Остерегайтесь {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}ведьм{/g}, ибо они запятнаны {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}варпом{/g}, преследуйте мутантов, ибо они извращение облика человеческого, и ненавидьте проклятых {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}ксеносов{/g}".

{n}In a voice brimming with solemnity, Adalbert begins,{/n} "Every man and woman has their place in the order He created, and this order must be followed and the will of one's superiors obeyed. Beware of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches{/g}, for they have been stained by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}warp{/g}; persecute mutants, for they are perversions of the human form; and hate the accursed {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Полным торжественности голосом преподобный начинает:{/n} "Каждому человеку отведено место в созданном Им порядке, потому надобно следовать этому порядку и всяко подчиняться воле вышестоящих. Остерегайтесь {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}ведьм{/g}, ибо они запятнаны {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}варпом{/g}, преследуйте мутантов, ибо они извращение облика человеческого, и ненавидьте проклятых {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}ксеносов{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}In a voice brimming with solemnity, the reverend begins,{/n} "The Emperor once walked among men, but always was, is, and ever will be the one and only God. Every man and woman has their place within the order He created, and thus this order must be followed and the will of one's superiors, obeyed. Beware of witches, for they have been stained by the warp; persecute mutants, for they are a perversion of the human form; and hate the accursed xenos."

Every man and woman has their place within the order He created, and thus this order must be followed and the will of one's superiors, obeyed. Beware of witches, for they have been stained by the warp; persecute mutants, for they are a perversion of the human form; and hate the accursed xenos."

Every man and woman has their place in the order He created, and this order must be followed and the will of one's superiors obeyed. Beware of witches, for they have been stained by the warp; persecute mutants, for they are perversions of the human form; and hate the accursed xenos."

Beware of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches{/g}, for they have been stained by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}warp{/g}; persecute mutants, for they are perversions of the human form; and hate the accursed {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g}."

languages.text: {n}D'une voix débordante de solennité, Adalbert commence à parler :{/n} « Chaque homme et chaque femme a sa place dans l'ordre qu'Il a créé, ordre que nous nous devons de suivre en nous pliant à la volonté de nos supérieurs. Méfiez-vous des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorciers{/g}, car ils portent la souillure du {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Warp{/g} ; persécutez les mutants, car ils sont une perversion de l'être humain ; et haïssez les vils {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xénos{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}In a voice brimming with solemnity, Adalbert begins,{/n} "Every man and woman has their place in the order He created, and this order must be followed and the will of one's superiors obeyed. Beware of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches{/g}, for they have been stained by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}warp{/g}; persecute mutants, for they are perversions of the human form; and hate the accursed {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}D'une voix débordante de solennité, Adalbert commence à parler :{/n} « Chaque homme et chaque femme a sa place dans l'ordre qu'Il a créé, ordre que nous nous devons de suivre en nous pliant à la volonté de nos supérieurs. Méfiez-vous des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}sorciers{/g}, car ils portent la souillure du {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Warp{/g} ; persécutez les mutants, car ils sont une perversion de l'être humain ; et haïssez les vils {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xénos{/g}. »

languages.text: {n}Adalbert comienza a declamar con solemnidad.{/n} «Todo hombre y mujer ocupa un lugar en el orden que el Emperador ha creado; es imperativo que todos preserven este orden y acaten la voluntad de sus superiores. Guardaos de la {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}brujería{/g}, pues quienes la practican han sido corrompidos por la {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}disformidad{/g}; exterminad a los mutantes, pues son perversiones de la forma humana, y no profeséis más que odio por los sacrílegos {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}In a voice brimming with solemnity, Adalbert begins,{/n} "Every man and woman has their place in the order He created, and this order must be followed and the will of one's superiors obeyed. Beware of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches{/g}, for they have been stained by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}warp{/g}; persecute mutants, for they are perversions of the human form; and hate the accursed {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert comienza a declamar con solemnidad.{/n} «Todo hombre y mujer ocupa un lugar en el orden que el Emperador ha creado; es imperativo que todos preserven este orden y acaten la voluntad de sus superiores. Guardaos de la {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}brujería{/g}, pues quienes la practican han sido corrompidos por la {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}disformidad{/g}; exterminad a los mutantes, pues son perversiones de la forma humana, y no profeséis más que odio por los sacrílegos {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g}».

languages.text: {n}阿达伯特以无比庄重的声音开了口。{/n}“在神皇创造的秩序中，每个人都会找到自己的位置。我们必须服从祂的秩序，听从祂的意志。要当心{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}女巫{/g}，因为她们遭到了{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}亚空间{/g}的污染。要迫害变种人，因为他们是披着人皮的怪物。除此之外，还要对那些被诅咒的{g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}异形{/g}充满憎恨。”
languages.original_text: {n}In a voice brimming with solemnity, Adalbert begins,{/n} "Every man and woman has their place in the order He created, and this order must be followed and the will of one's superiors obeyed. Beware of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches{/g}, for they have been stained by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}warp{/g}; persecute mutants, for they are perversions of the human form; and hate the accursed {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿达伯特以无比庄重的声音开了口。{/n}“在神皇创造的秩序中，每个人都会找到自己的位置。我们必须服从祂的秩序，听从祂的意志。要当心{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}女巫{/g}，因为她们遭到了{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}亚空间{/g}的污染。要迫害变种人，因为他们是披着人皮的怪物。除此之外，还要对那些被诅咒的{g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}异形{/g}充满憎恨。”

languages.text: {n}アダルバートは話し始めた。{/n} 「皇帝は、かつて人の間を歩まれたが、今も昔も、そしてこれからも、唯一無二の神であるでしょう。すべての男女は、皇帝が創られた世の中で、自分の居場所を持ち、この秩序に従い、皇帝の意志に従わなければならないのです。そして、{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}<歪み>{/g}に汚されている{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}魔女{/g}には気を付けなければいけない。さらに、ミュータントを迫害しなさい。彼らは人間の形を変質させたものです。{g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}そして異種族を憎む{/g}」
languages.original_text: {n}In a voice brimming with solemnity, Adalbert begins,{/n} "Every man and woman has their place in the order He created, and this order must be followed and the will of one's superiors obeyed. Beware of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches{/g}, for they have been stained by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}warp{/g}; persecute mutants, for they are perversions of the human form; and hate the accursed {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}アダルバートは話し始めた。{/n} 「皇帝は、かつて人の間を歩まれたが、今も昔も、そしてこれからも、唯一無二の神であるでしょう。すべての男女は、皇帝が創られた世の中で、自分の居場所を持ち、この秩序に従い、皇帝の意志に従わなければならないのです。そして、{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}<歪み>{/g}に汚されている{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}魔女{/g}には気を付けなければいけない。さらに、ミュータントを迫害しなさい。彼らは人間の形を変質させたものです。{g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}そして異種族を憎む{/g}」

languages.text: {n}Adalbert stimmt mit feierlicher Stimme an:{/n} "Jeder Mann und jede Frau hat in der Ordnung des Imperators einen festen Platz. Diese Ordnung gilt es zu befolgen, dem Willen der Oberen zu gehorchen. Hütet Euch vor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}Hexen{/g}, denn sie wurden vom {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Warp{/g} vergiftet. Verfolgt Mutanten, denn sie sind Perversionen der menschlichen Gestalt. Und hasst die verfluchten {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}Xenos{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}In a voice brimming with solemnity, Adalbert begins,{/n} "Every man and woman has their place in the order He created, and this order must be followed and the will of one's superiors obeyed. Beware of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches{/g}, for they have been stained by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}warp{/g}; persecute mutants, for they are perversions of the human form; and hate the accursed {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert stimmt mit feierlicher Stimme an:{/n} "Jeder Mann und jede Frau hat in der Ordnung des Imperators einen festen Platz. Diese Ordnung gilt es zu befolgen, dem Willen der Oberen zu gehorchen. Hütet Euch vor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}Hexen{/g}, denn sie wurden vom {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Warp{/g} vergiftet. Verfolgt Mutanten, denn sie sind Perversionen der menschlichen Gestalt. Und hasst die verfluchten {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}Xenos{/g}."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert her açıdan büyük bir ciddiyet içeren bir ses tonuyla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Her bir erkeğin ve kadının, O'nun yarattığı düzende yeri vardır ve bu düzene uyulmalıdır ve de kişi üstlerinin iradesine de uymalıdır. {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}Cadılara{/g} karşı dikkatli olun, onlar {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}öteboyut{/g} tarafından lekelenmişlerdir; mutantlara eziyet çektirin, onlar insan biçiminin sapkınlıklarıdır ve de lanetli {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}zenolardan{/g} nefret edin."
languages.original_text: {n}In a voice brimming with solemnity, Adalbert begins,{/n} "Every man and woman has their place in the order He created, and this order must be followed and the will of one's superiors obeyed. Beware of {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches{/g}, for they have been stained by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}warp{/g}; persecute mutants, for they are perversions of the human form; and hate the accursed {g|Encyclopedia:XenosGlossary}xenos{/g}."
